Package SmProcessing

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ABC2
    This class performs the adaptive baseline correction to search for a baseline function that corrects the velocity trace with the goal of passing the quality checks and maximizing goodness of fit.
    AICEventDetect
    This class computes AIC for the input array and picks the P (event) onset.
    ArrayOps
    The ArrayOps class contains static methods to perform various operations on an input array.
    ArrayStats
    The ArrayStats class contains methods to calculate various statistics on an array that is entered during object construction.
    ButterworthFilter
    function bandpass (s, nd, f1, f2, delt, nroll, icaus)
    ComputedParams
    The computed parameters class calculates the computed parameters for records where the acceleration exceeds a threshold (default is 5% g) at any point.
    Decimation
    The Decimation class provides the inverse to the Resampling class by reducing the number of samples in the record to the original sampling rate.
    Despiking
    DESPIKING DISCRETE-TIME SIGNAL USING HISTOGRAM METHOD Time series may contain undesired transients and spikes.
    EventOnsetCoefs
    This class contains the coefficients for the PwD event onset detection calculations.
    EventOnsetDetection
    This class uses the P-wave Detector method to pick the event onset time.
    EventOnsetProcess
    This class handles the event onset processing for the larger V2 process work flow.
    FFourierTransform
    This class calculates the FFT of an array using the Apache Commons Math package and returns the result as magnitudes (square root of the squares of the real and imaginary parts).
    FFTinteDiff
    The FFTintediff class provides algorithms for integration and differentiation of a discrete time-signal in the frequency domain using omega arithmetic.
    FilterAndIntegrateProcess
    This class performs the filtering of the acceleration array and its integration to velocity and again to displacement.
    FilterCutOffThresholds
    This class chooses the Butterworth filter cutoff thresholds to use, based on either the magnitude of the earthquake or the frequency content of the seismic signal.
    QCcheck
    This class handles the QC checks for velocity and displacement, using the QC limits defined in the configuration file.
    RawTraceConversion
    This static factory class is used during processing of raw trace counts to physical values.
    Resampling
    The Resampling class re-samples records to a higher sampling rate as needed.
    SpectraResources
    This class provides access to the coefficient tables for the different sampling rates and damping values, as well as the file of periods, used during processing of response spectra.
    TrendRemovalProcess
    This class removes any pre-event mean from the acceleration array, then integrates to velocity, looks for a trend in velocity and removes the derivative of the trend from the acceleration array.
    V1Process
    The V1Process class executes the steps necessary to generate a V1 product file from a V0 input file.
    V2Process
    This class handles the V2 processing, performing the necessary steps to process the uncorrected acceleration into corrected acceleration, velocity and displacement.
    V2ProcessGUI
    This class provides V2 processing functions needed by the Review Tool during manual processing of V1 acceleration.
    V3Process
    The V3Process class executes the steps necessary to generate a V3 product file from a V2 component object.
